title: How To Refuse King Scouts - Novel Updates
tags: Age Regression   Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Magic   Royalty   Second Chance   S*aves   Wizards
author: 커피바닐라
description:
Amelia, a slave who is on the verge of dying after being tested by an evil master! She returns to five years ago thanks to the magic manifested only by her instinct to not die. 

She was released from slavery, killed her master, and ran away. She does not want to use magic to hide her past, but she cannot find a job because she is unknown. Eventually, she made and sold magic scrolls while hiding her identity to live on, and she was chased by people trying to scout her because of her high-powered scrolls… 

and fleeing to a new country to avoid them, this time the king is chasing her to scout! Amelia’s undisputed survival life!>
